pr_title: [HUDI-1192] Make create hive database automatically configurable

timeline.message:
HUDI-1192
Fix the failure of creating hive database

timeline.author: yanghua

timeline.bodyText: I still have a question here. If we do not allow initializing hive database. Or if the database does not exist. Would affect the subsequent business logic?
timeline.author: yanghua

replies.bodyText: The choice to create a database here is because hive database is usually only created by hive users, and other users have no permission to create hive tables.
replies.author: liujinhui1994

replies.bodyText: Should we just throw an error and exit if enableCreateDatabase=false and the database does not exist?
replies.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: Yes, I have discussed with @liujinhui1994 off-line about this issue and asked him to find a way to check whether the database exists or not.
replies.author: yanghua

timeline.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: Also should the value be true by default to preserve existing behavior
replies.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: @vinothchandar We do not let hudi create databases by default. So false seems to be ok :) @bvaradar to chime in here.
replies.author: pratyakshsharma

replies.bodyText: https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/e1b7f97c774e1d7d7fc54fbb46db49aaf2e217303a50d9885150242d%40%3Cdev.hudi.apache.org%3E - this is what I am referring to. :)
replies.author: pratyakshsharma

replies.bodyText: Ok, my bad. Missed changes for creation of hive database.
replies.author: pratyakshsharma

timeline.bodyText: It's an open topic. IMHO, checkDatabaseExist is a better method name. WDYT?
timeline.author: yanghua

replies.bodyText: I refer to other names in the source code that also have similar functions
replies.author: liujinhui1994

replies.bodyText:
What do you think？ if checkDatabaseExist is better, I am very willing to modify
@yanghua
replies.author: liujinhui1994
yanghua
